data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ribeiro-Costa, Cibele Stramare (2007): A new species of Merobruchus Bridwell near Merobruchus boucheri Kingsolver (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Bruchinae). Zootaxa 1449: 51-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176224
